name: BMW X1
detail: The F48 BMW X1 is the second and current generation of the BMW X1 range of subcompact luxury crossover SUV.

name: BMW X3
detail: BMW launched the third generation X3 (codenamed G01) in India on 19 April 2018 with a diesel-only powertrain. After two months, the brand also introduced a petrol variant of the X3.

name: BMW X4
detail: The BMW X4 distinguishes itself in the SUV car lineup with its distinctive Coupe characteristics.

name: BMW X5
detail: The fourth-generation X5 (Codenamed G05) was introduced in the country on 16 May 2019. Meanwhile, BMW updated the X5 range by adding two new variants in September 2021.

name: BMW X6
detail: German luxury marquee BMW has unveiled the third generation X6. The model will make its debut at the 2019 Frankfurt Motor Show later this year.

name: BMW X7
detail: The exceptionally large kidney grille lends it a family face. On the other hand, the BMW Laser Light technology with blue X-shaped elements give it an aggressive look.

name: BMW X8
detail: The BMW X8 is a rumoured halo four-door coupe SUV from the Bavarian car manufacturer. Considering BMW already offers a feature-rich ultra-luxurious

name: BMW 2 Series
detail: After a long wait, BMW has finally revealed the 2 Series Gran Coupe. Not to be confused as a 2 Series Coupe with two extra doors.

name: BMW 3 Series
detail: The Gran Limousine version was initially showcased at the Auto Shanghai 2019 and was to be developed for the Chinese market.

name: BMW 5 Series
detail: BMW has launched the facelifted 5 Series in India. Unveiled in May last year, the refreshed model is available in three variants.

name: BMW 7 Series
detail: The new BMW 7 Series gets bespoke leather upholstery and trims, improved sound insulation, ambient lighting, ambient air package and a panoramic glass roof sky lounge with LED light graphics to create that perfect ambience.
